name: Tower Knight (PotatoToasterCat, brentnicks)
description:
Climb a tower that creates itself as you go and brave the evil Dark Knight who rules over the tower. Choose your path as you climb the ever winding tower.

Controls

W : Jump

A, D : Move left and right

Left click: Attack

Click on the next level to select it

Credits

Made by Brent Nicks and Bowen Lai

Other Contributors

  • Music by Kovicon
  • Archer Sprite by Rephira

    • https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-dark-forest
  • Knight Sprites by RGS Dev
    • https://rgsdev.itch.io/pixel-art-animated-knight-character-pack-rgsdev
  • Background by edermunizz
    • https://edermunizz.itch.io/free-pixel-art-forest
  • Additional help from Eggo

Thank you for checking the game out!
